item.title: Return to Mermaid Diagrams
item.description: I have been meaning to get back into making flow charts for a while. Over the years, I have tried different code packages, but I think that mermaid graphs make the most sense for my simple goals. library("DiagrammeR") For todayâ€™s practice, let us try to make a 2-by-2 decision tree. DiagrammeR::mermaid(" graph LR node1(start) node2{A} node3{not A} node4[B given A] node5[not B given A] node6[B given not A] node7[not B given not A] node1 --> node2 node1 --> node3 node2 --> node4 node2 --> node5 node3 --> node6 node3 --> node7 ") {"
